hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account with the help of a trusted friend.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend who also uses DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code with their app to confirm your identity.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Let a trusted connection in your DamDoh network scan this QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and will expire in 10 minutes.

AppFooter.tagline: The global agricultural supply chain platform.

hero.title: About DamDoh
hero.subtitle: Connecting the global agricultural supply chain, one stakeholder at a time.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: We envision a world where every agricultural stakeholder, from the smallest farmer to the largest retailer, is empowered with the data, connections, and tools they need to thrive.
vision.p2: DamDoh was founded on the belief that technology can bridge gaps, build trust, and create a more equitable and sustainable global food system.

challenge.title: The Challenge We're Solving
challenge.description: The agricultural supply chain is fragmented, inefficient, and often lacks the transparency needed for sustainable growth. Key challenges include:

list.knowledge: Fragmented knowledge and lack of access to best practices.
list.market: Limited market access for smallholder farmers.
list.quality: Inconsistent quality control and a lack of verifiable product data.
list.logistics: Inefficient logistics leading to post-harvest losses.
list.financial: Difficulty in accessing finance and insurance for small-scale producers.
list.climate: Increasing pressure from climate change on traditional farming methods.
list.informal: Informal and relationship-based systems that can exclude new entrants.

solution.title: The DamDoh Solution
solution.description: We are building a comprehensive 'super app' that digitizes and connects the entire agricultural ecosystem through several key pillars:

p2p.title: Peer-to-Peer
p2p.content: Connecting farmers to other farmers to share knowledge and build community.

p2b.title: Person-to-Business
p2b.content: Fostering direct, trusted relationships between producers and buyers.

p2e.title: Person-to-Ecosystem
p2e.content: Giving individuals access to an entire ecosystem of services - finance, logistics, insurance, and more.

p2w.title: Person-to-World
p2w.content: Opening up global markets and opportunities for the most remote producers through digital access and traceability.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to the Future
commitment.p1: We are committed to using technology for good, building a platform that is not only profitable but also regenerative for our planet and empowering for its people.
commitment.p2: Every connection made, piece of knowledge shared, and transaction streamlined on DamDoh is a step toward a more resilient and equitable food future.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.

sendMessage.title: Send Us a Message
sendMessage.note: We strive to respond within 24 business hours.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join our mission to revolutionize the agricultural supply chain.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, we are a team of passionate innovators, technologists, and agricultural experts dedicated to creating tangible global impact. We offer:
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Opportunities for professional growth and learning.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: A culture of collaboration and transparency.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: The chance to work with cutting-edge technologies like AI and blockchain.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: A commitment to sustainability and social impact.

job1.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Next.js, Firebase)
job1.description: We are looking for an experienced full-stack engineer to lead development on core features of our platform.

job2.title: Agronomic Content Specialist
job2.description: Help us build the world's most comprehensive knowledge base for sustainable farming practices.

job3.title: UX/UI Designer
job3.description: Design intuitive and accessible user experiences for a diverse, global user base.

noOpenings.title: No Openings Currently
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for talented individuals who are passionate about our mission. If you think you'd be a great fit for our team, please send your resume and cover letter to {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Fostering a professional, trustworthy, and collaborative environment.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! Our mission is to connect the agricultural world in a positive and productive way. To ensure everyone has a great experience, we ask that you adhere to the following guidelines:

respectful.title: Be Respectful & Professional
respectful.description: Engage in civil and constructive discussions. Disagreements are normal, but personal attacks, harassment, and hate speech are not acceptable.

authentic.title: Be Honest & Authentic
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business accurately. Do not impersonate others or provide false information about your products, services, or certifications.

relevant.title: Stay On-Topic
relevant.description: Contribute to discussions and listings in a way that is relevant to the agricultural supply chain. Spam, scams, and irrelevant promotional content will be removed.

fairTrade.title: Honor Your Commitments
fairTrade.description: When you make an agreement on the platform, follow through. Building trust is essential to our community's success.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainability
sustainable.description: While not a strict requirement for all members, we encourage the sharing of knowledge and practices that promote environmental, economic, and social sustainability.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our team at {emailLink}. We will review all reports and take appropriate action.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By using DamDoh, you agree to these guidelines. We reserve the right to remove content and suspend accounts that violate these principles. Thank you for helping us build a great community!

industryNewsPage.title: Industry News & Insights
industryNewsPage.description: Stay informed on the latest trends, research, and policy changes affecting the global agricultural supply chain.

noNews.title: No News Found
noNews.description: Check back later for the latest industry updates and reports.

news1.title: Global Coffee Prices Surge Amidst Climate Concerns in Key Growing Regions
news1.excerpt: Coffee arabica futures hit an 18-month high as drought in Brazil and unexpected frost in Vietnam threaten global supply.

news2.title: EU Implements New 'Farm to Fork' Packaging Regulations
news2.excerpt: New regulations coming into effect this quarter will require all fresh produce imported into the European Union to use packaging made of at least 30% recycled materials.

news3.title: Study Finds Regenerative Farming Practices Can Sequester Up to 2 Tons of Carbon Per Hectare Annually
news3.excerpt: A decade-long study published in 'Nature Sustainability' provides strong evidence that no-till farming and cover cropping significantly improve soil carbon levels.
